Comedy Club.english: 1. Comedy Club is a great place to laugh.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club è un ottimo posto per ridere.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club es un gran lugar para reír.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club ist ein großartiger Ort zum Lachen.

Comedy Club.english: 2. The comedian had the audience in stitches.
Comedy Club.italian: Il comico ha fatto scompisciare il pubblico.
Comedy Club.spanish: El comediante hizo reír a carcajadas al público.
Comedy Club.german: Der Comedian brachte das Publikum zum Lachen.

Comedy Club.english: 3. The stand-up show was hilarious from beginning to end.
Comedy Club.italian: Lo spettacolo di stand-up è stato esilarante dall'inizio alla fine.
Comedy Club.spanish: El espectáculo de stand-up fue hilarante de principio a fin.
Comedy Club.german: Die Stand-up-Show war von Anfang bis Ende urkomisch.

Comedy Club.english: 4. The audience couldn't stop laughing at the comedian's jokes.
Comedy Club.italian: Il pubblico non riusciva a smettere di ridere alle battute del comico.
Comedy Club.spanish: El público no podía dejar de reírse de los chistes del comediante.
Comedy Club.german: Das Publikum konnte nicht aufhören zu lachen über die Witze des Comedians.

Comedy Club.english: 5. The Comedy Club always brings in top-notch comedians.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club porta sempre comici di prim'ordine.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club siempre trae comediantes de primera categoría.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club bringt immer erstklassige Comedians.

Comedy Club.english: 6. The stand-up comedian had the crowd roaring with laughter.
Comedy Club.italian: Il comico di stand-up ha fatto ridere a crepapelle la folla.
Comedy Club.spanish: El comediante de stand-up hizo que la multitud rugiera de risa.
Comedy Club.german: Der Stand-up-Comedian brachte die Menge zum Toben vor Lachen.

Comedy Club.english: 7. The Comedy Club offers a night of comedy and entertainment.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club offre una serata di comicità e intrattenimento.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club ofrece una noche de comedia y entretenimiento.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club bietet einen Abend voller Comedy und Unterhaltung.

Comedy Club.english: 8. The comedian's punchlines were hilarious.
Comedy Club.italian: Le battute del comico erano esilaranti.
Comedy Club.spanish: Las punchlines del comediante eran graciosísimas.
Comedy Club.german: Die Pointen des Comedians waren urkomisch.

Comedy Club.english: 9. The Comedy Club is a popular spot for a night out.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club è un posto popolare per una serata fuori.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club es un lugar popular para salir por la noche.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club ist ein beliebter Ort für einen Abend Ausgehen.

Comedy Club.english: 10. The comedian's witty remarks had everyone in stitches.
Comedy Club.italian: I commenti spiritosi del comico hanno fatto scompisciare tutti.
Comedy Club.spanish: Las observaciones ingeniosas del comediante hicieron reír a carcajadas a todos.
Comedy Club.german: Die geistreichen Bemerkungen des Comedians brachten alle zum Lachen.

Comedy Club.english: 11. The Comedy Club brings laughter to people's lives.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club porta risate nella vita delle persone.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club lleva risas a la vida de las personas.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club bringt Lachen in das Leben der Menschen.

Comedy Club.english: 12. The comedian had a unique style of humor.
Comedy Club.italian: Il comico aveva uno stile di umorismo unico.
Comedy Club.spanish: El comediante tenía un estilo de humor único.
Comedy Club.german: Der Comedian hatte einen einzigartigen Humor.

Comedy Club.english: 13. The Comedy Club showcases a variety of comedic talents.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club presenta una varietà di talenti comici.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club muestra una variedad de talentos cómicos.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club präsentiert eine Vielzahl komödiantischer Talente.

Comedy Club.english: 14. The audience erupted into laughter at the comedian's antics.
Comedy Club.italian: Il pubblico scoppiò in risate alle buffonate del comico.
Comedy Club.spanish: El público estalló en risas ante las payasadas del comediante.
Comedy Club.german: Das Publikum brach in Gelächter aus über die Possen des Comedians.

Comedy Club.english: 15. The Comedy Club guarantees a night of fun and laughter.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club garantisce una serata di divertimento e risate.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club garantiza una noche de diversión y risas.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club garantiert einen Abend voller Spaß und Gelächter.

Comedy Club.english: 16. The comedian's timing was impeccable.
Comedy Club.italian: Il tempismo del comico era impeccabile.
Comedy Club.spanish: El tiempo del comediante era impecable.
Comedy Club.german: Das Timing des Comedians war tadellos.

Comedy Club.english: 17. The Comedy Club provides a platform for up-and-coming comedians.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club offre una piattaforma per comici emergenti.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club ofrece una plataforma para comediantes prometedores.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club bietet eine Plattform für aufstrebende Comedians.

Comedy Club.english: 18. The comedian had the whole room in stitches.
Comedy Club.italian: Il comico ha fatto scompisciare l'intera sala.
Comedy Club.spanish: El comediante hizo reír a carcajadas a toda la habitación.
Comedy Club.german: Der Comedian brachte den ganzen Raum zum Lachen.

Comedy Club.english: 19. The Comedy Club is known for its side-splitting performances.
Comedy Club.italian: Il Comedy Club è noto per le sue performance che fanno scoppiare dalle risate.
Comedy Club.spanish: El Comedy Club es conocido por sus actuaciones desternillantes.
Comedy Club.german: Das Comedy Club ist bekannt für seine zum Brüllen komischen Auftritte.

Comedy Club.english: 20. The comedian's jokes had the audience rolling in the aisles.
Comedy Club.italian: Le battute del comico hanno fatto rotolare il pubblico per gli scalini dalle risate.
Comedy Club.spanish: Los chistes del comediante hicieron que el público se revolcara de risa en los pasillos.
Comedy Club.german: Die Witze des Comedians brachten das Publikum vor Lachen auf den Boden.
